Question & Options:
Which of the following statements accurately describe the summary of the movie 'Dangal' released in 2016?
Options:
A. A. 'Dangal' is based on the true story of a wrestler training his daughters.
B. B. The movie depicts a fictional tale of a superhero saving the world.
C. C. 'Dangal' highlights themes of gender equality and empowerment in sports.
D. D. The film showcases the struggles of a father in a patriarchal society.
